data.name: Underland Ambush
data.detailed_description:
When Selecta Dax , the infamous space pirate, leaps into a dark abyss in flight of his captors, he is plunged into an unfamiliar realm inhabited by gnomes, killer clowns, rocket powered raptors, and to his surprise, the slain enemies of his many violent conquests. Brave the Underland Ambush and survive the afterlife to escape the infinite loop of mortality!

Featuring a soundtrack provided by the cyber realms greatest composers.

"When space pirates perish, to Underland go

To right all the wrongs and face all the foes

They sent on the road with iris aglow

Tread lightly, my pirate, and fight for your soul"

-Arkala, the oracle

data.short_description: Scifi run and gun arcade action Featuring a soundtrack provided by the cyber realms greatest composers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7 64
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 380 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
